content_descriptors.notes:
The soundtrack does not contain any age restrictions.

The game is intended for adults only and contains sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters, story, and actions are fictitious. All characters are depicted as 18 and over.

The game contains nudity, consensual and non-consensual sex, violence, sexual violcene (rape, abuse, hypnosis), alternative lifestyles, blackmail, use and sale of alcohol and drugs, swearing, BDSM, H-scenes of oral, vaginal, anal and non-penetrative sexual acts.
